name: Jenny Cholmes
description: Jenny Cholmes is a postdoctoral fellow in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at the University of Saskatchewan. She received her B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Saskatchewan in 2011 and her M.Sc. and Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering from the University of British Columbia in 2013 and 2017, respectively. Her research interests include the development of novel MRI techniques to study knee joint function in osteoarthritis.

name: Jarome Nickerson
description: Jason Nickerson is a PhD student in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at the University of Saskatchewan. He received his B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Saskatchewan in 2013 and his M.A.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering from the University of British Columbia in 2015. His research interests include the development of novel MRI techniques to study knee joint function in osteoarthritis.

name: Jason Baldwin
description: Jason Baldwin is a Masters student in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at the University of Saskatchewan. He received his B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Saskatchewan in 2016. His research interests include the development of novel MRI techniques to study knee joint function in osteoarthritis.
